ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] all i can say is hmmmm
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the $50 for 1 character will deter most rational EQ players. Of the remaining determined to do it, I ll bet over 50% get ripped off in equipment
ygData.messageBody:
I think the $50 for 1 character will deter most rational EQ players.

Of the remaining determined to do it, I'll bet over 50% get ripped off in
equipment trades, and the subsequent uproar should be entertaining.

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Friday, July 06, 2001 11:14 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] all i can say is hmmmm


I agree, its gonna be ... sucky.

However, I do think that people have some basic rights as consumers as well.
I'm not sure this is the best middle ground though.

Tani/Halana
